name: CUBE: Attack of the Polyhedrons
description:
In development for over a month, CUBE will take you to a new dimension of computer games! Pick up your control switch and enter another world! Play as CUBE, Defender of the Polyverse, and fight against the dreaded CONE.
* Only available on the Monotech Power Game Unit

Controls:

Jump - Space

Movement - WASD or Arrow Keys

Look Around - Mouse

Hold ESC - Exit Game
